title: The Rocket
creator_credit: William Pollard, Anthony Gilkison, Rayant Pictures and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: Illustrates the progress of the rocket from a Chinese firecracker, through various 17th century inspirations for space travel, to its applications today. Shows scenes of Britain’s rocket research establishments; points out the part played rockets in World War II., and describes some American post-war experiments in rocket development.
